section.name: Current Status
section.p: For all current committers and anyone wishing to contribute to or use HttpClient, we are now in the final stages of 2.0 development.
Only bug fixes and documentation enhancements will be made to the 2.0 code base in the next few weeks. We hope to have a final 2.0 release shortly.
Now that 2.0 beta 2 has been released initial development for post 2.0 releases can begin. A CVS branch of the 2.0 code will be made shortly so that 2.1 development can begin on the HEAD.
